sys_remote_update_set.description: Attach screenshots in incident from clipboard. Work with record producer in incident form. Currently supported browswer : IE11, Edge and Chrome. V1.1. V.1.0 : initial release 2016_07_21 V.1.1 : support for Edge, GSLog and feedback after attachment V.1.2 : support other table that "incident" V1.3 : Visual feedback after a successful paste. Messages can be customized and localized (French translation included) V1.4 : Bug fixed in the IE visual feedback
sys_remote_update_set.name: 2016_10_13 JLC Merged Attach screenshots in table from clipboard
